testcase.name: Verify Contact Details functionality with valid data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given chrome is opened and magicbricks app is opened........................passed When User enters "Kolkata" in AddMore field.................................passed And User clicks on Location.................................................passed Then User navigates to ProductList page.....................................passed When User clicks on any product.............................................passed Then User navigates to ProductDetails page..................................passed Then ProductDetails fields are visible to user..............................passed Then User is able to click on Download brochure button......................passed And User enters Name "Bharathi" Email "barumoonstone@gmail.com" Mobile "8825744851".passed Then User clicks on Get submit button.......................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Contact Details functionality with invalid data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given chrome is opened and magicbricks app is opened........................passed When User enters "Kolkata" in AddMore field.................................passed And User clicks on Location.................................................passed Then User navigates to ProductList page.....................................passed When User clicks on any product.............................................passed Then User navigates to ProductDetails page..................................passed Then ProductDetails fields are visible to user..............................passed Then User is able to click on Download brochure button......................passed And User enters Name "Bharathi" Email "$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$" Mobile "8825744851".passed Then User gets invalid data message.........................................passed
